tool_description: Creates customized rating scales for survey questions, including Likert scales, numerical ratings, semantic differentials, and other measurement approaches with proper labeling and anchoring.

scale_type.description: Type of rating scale: likert, numerical, semantic_differential, frequency, agreement, or satisfaction

include_neutral.description: Whether to include a neutral/middle option

custom_labels.description: Custom labels for scale points (must match scale_points count)

reverse_scale.description: Whether to reverse the scale direction

error_messages: Invalid scale type: Use one of [likert, numerical, semantic_differential, frequency, agreement, satisfaction].
Scale points out of range: Must be between 3 and 11 points.
Custom labels mismatch: Number of custom_labels must equal scale_points.
Neutral option conflict: Cannot include neutral option with even number of scale points.
Empty custom labels: If provided, custom_labels cannot contain empty strings.
usage: Specify scale_type and scale_points. Optionally configure include_neutral, custom_labels, and reverse_scale. The tool generates properly formatted rating scales with appropriate labels and anchoring.

scale_labels.description: Ordered labels for each scale point

scale_values.description: Numerical values assigned to each scale point

neutral_position.description: Position of neutral option if included, 0 if not included
